Item.OrderTitle: Community Hospitals: Ten Minute Rule Motion

Text.p: That leave be given to bring in a Bill to make provision for community ownership of hospitals owned by NHS Property Services Ltd.; to facilitate the integration of health and social care services provided in those hospitals; and for connected purposes.
